original_title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer: Masters from the Vaults
overview: This is Emerson Lake & Palmer captured at the very beginning of a legendary career. Filmed at the time when the band had only just recorded their ground breaking first album ELP had to use all of their huge individual creative talents to create a full show. This is an essential addition to the collection of any fan of the progressive rock era.
title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer: Masters from the Vaults
